name: Isekaiverse
introduce: Isekaiverse is a next-generation decentralized Anime Metaverse project aims to be the biggest Anime hub in the Web 3 space. Isekaiverse is using its original Anime TV show ‘Mystic Reign’, a unique franchise as the foundation for everything else it is doing. It is goal to become a globally recognized brand not only in the Web 3 space but also outside in the real world with Anime series streaming on platforms like Netflix, Hulu, and Crunchyroll.
